text: Giuseppe Castiglione (1688 — 1766), was an Italian painter. He worked as an artist at the imperial court of three Chinese emperors – the Kangxi, Yongzheng and Qianlong emperors. ==Gallery== File:Qianlong emperor hunting.jpg|Qianlong Emperor chasing a deer on a hunting trip Category:Italian painters Category:1688 births Category:1766 deaths Category:Jesuit missionaries Category:People from Milan Category:18th-century Italian painters
title: Giuseppe Castiglione
